channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Dow drops 600 points and the Nasdaq reels as Trump blames Powell and Tesla adds to tech woes
One day before Pope Francis' death, Vice President Vance received an audience on Easter Sunday
Tesla must do these 3 on its earnings call, or else
Trump warns of economic slowdown unless Fed cuts rates
Sherpa climber set to break his own record for ascents of Mount Everest
Pope Francis live updates: Leader of the Catholic Church dies at 88, Vatican confirms
60,000 Americans to lose their rental assistance and risk eviction unless Congress acts
Secondhand stores are poised to benefit if US tariffs drive up new clothing costs
Drones pose increasing risk to airliners near major US airports
item.description: An Associated Press analysis of an aviation safety database reveals that drones last year accounted for nearly two-thirds of reported near midair coll...

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Lawmakers to travel to El Salvador amid deportation fight
item.description: Democratic lawmakers are advocating for the release of Kilmar Abrego Garcia and other detainees.

item.title: Pope Francis mourned worldwide as Catholic Church prepares for next chapter
item.description: Pope Francis died Monday at the age of 88. As tributes pour in from around the world, the Vatican faces a transition.

item.title: What happens next after Pope Francis' death?
item.description: The death of Pope Francis initiates a centuries-old process of rituals and traditions culminating with a conclave to choose his successor.

item.title: President Zelenskyy | Tonight on 60 Minutes
item.description: Inside a bomb shelter for schoolchildren, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy met Scott Pelley. The school is mourning after a Russian missile kil...

item.title: Canonization of first millennial saint postponed after pope's death
item.description: Carlos Acutis is set to become the first millennial saint. His canonization was moved to next Sunday in St. Peter's Square after the death of Pope Fra...

item.title: Electing a new pope: What happens next and what is a papal conclave?
item.description: What to know about electing a new pope after the death of Pope Francis.

item.title: Which cardinals are seen as contenders to be the next pope?
item.description: Even though cardinals don’t campaign for the job, there are always front-runners going into a conclave to choose the next pope

item.title: Hegseth attacks media, former employees after 2nd Signal chat revealed
item.description: “I have spoken with the president and we are going to continue fighting. On the same page all the way,” Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said on Monday.

item.title: What will happen at the funeral of Pope Francis?
item.description: Pope Francis had expressed the desire to be buried in the Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore, a fifth-century church in Rome.
